.. sip:method-description::
    :status: todo
    :pysig: 6b935b07493540bfb045e14d5ce73619
    :realsig: (GLuint,const QMatrix4x4&,QOpenGLTextureBlitter::Origin)
    :digest: c9cc575b97f37cad62728bf4942222c7

Performs the blit with the source texture *texture*.

*targetTransform* specifies the transformation applied. This is usually generated by the :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.targetTransform` helper function.

*sourceOrigin* specifies if the image data needs flipping. When *texture* corresponds to a texture attached to an FBO pass :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.Origin.OriginBottomLeft`. On the other hand, when *texture* is based on unflipped image data, pass :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.Origin.OriginTopLeft`. This is more efficient than using :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtGui.QImage.flipped`.

.. seealso:: :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.targetTransform`, :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.Origin.Origin`, :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.bind`.
